text: [[img:bullet_dwf_crafting]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Seek out exotic ingredients during your campaign to[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_forging_magic_items]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_forging_magic_items}}]]perform experiments[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]in return for unique rewards.[[/col]]\\n\\n{{tr:ui_text_replacements_localised_text_how_they_play_dwarfs}}

[[img:ui/campaign ui/skills/hkrul_hroth_special_0_1.png]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Win battles to increase your reputation and make mercenary contracts across the world[[/col]]\\n\\n{{tr:how_they_play_ogres}}

[[img:ui/campaign ui/skills/innate_sceolan.png]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Your forces will gain a special ability if they start a turn in a Magical Forest or Frozen climate settlement.[[/col]]\\n\\n{{tr:how_they_play_wood_elves}}

[[img:ui/campaign ui/skills/hkrul_slaurith_special_0_1.png]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Seek out your past fellow knight by occupying the settlements and defeating the characters that protect them to gain great powers.[[/col]]\\n\\n{{tr:how_they_play_khorne}}
[[img:icon_caravan_cargo]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Send trade caravans across the world and become the tycoon of the transit trade.[[/col]]\\n\\n{{tr:how_they_play_high_elves}}

[[img:icon_chaos_gifts]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Capture the [[/col]] [[sl_link:campaign_slaves]]Slaves[[/sl_link]] [[col:green]] and sacrifice them to the Dark Gods in return for factionwide boons granted by[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_chaos_gifts]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_chaos_gifts}}]]Khorne[[/tooltip]][[/url]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_army]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Send your forces into multiple successive battles to progress through[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_bloodletting]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_bloodletting}}]]Bloodletting[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]levels and accumulate bonuses.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:bullet_nor_gods]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Raze settlements and raise monoliths in their place to gradually pledge[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_gods]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_gods}}]]Allegiance to the Khorne[[/tooltip]][[/url]][[col:green]], who will grant factionwide gifts.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:bullet_nor_monsters]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Hunt down creatures listed in the[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_monsters]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_monsters}}]]Monstrous Arcanum[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]and defeat them in battle in return for unique and powerful trophies.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_confederation]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Defeat the faction leaders of rival Norscan tribes to be given the option to form tribal[[/col]] [[sl_link:campaign_confederation]]confederations.[[/sl_link]]\\n\\nLearn more about Norsca [[url:script_link_campaign_norsca]]here[[/url]].

[[img:icon_grimoires]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Gather[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_grimoires]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_grimoires}}]]Grimoires[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]throughout your campaign to manipulate reality with the[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_changing_of_the_ways]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_changing_of_the_ways}}]]Changing of the Ways.[[/tooltip]][[/url]][[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_chaos_gifts]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Grimoires can be also sacrificed to the Dark Gods in return for factionwide boons granted by[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_chaos_gifts]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_chaos_gifts}}]]Tzeentch[[/tooltip]][[/url]]\\n\\n[[img:bullet_nor_gods]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Raze settlements and raise monoliths in their place to gradually pledge[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_gods]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_gods}}]]Allegiance to the Tzeentch[[/tooltip]][[/url]][[col:green]], who will grant factionwide gifts.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:bullet_nor_monsters]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Hunt down creatures listed in the[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_monsters]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_monsters}}]]Monstrous Arcanum[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]and defeat them in battle in return for unique and powerful trophies.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_confederation]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Defeat the faction leaders of rival Norscan tribes to be given the option to form tribal[[/col]] [[sl_link:campaign_confederation]]confederations.[[/sl_link]]\\n\\nLearn more about Norsca [[url:script_link_campaign_norsca]]here[[/url]].

[[img:icon_books_of_nagash]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Seek out the[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_books_of_nagash]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_books_of_nagash}}]]Books of Nagash[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]by occupying the settlements and defeating the characters that harbour them to gain great powers. Amplify their powers by constructing the Shadeheart Fortress at his homeland Forest of Shadows, Wolfenburg.[[/col]]\\n\\n{{tr:how_they_play_vampires_undead}}

[[img:icon_devotees]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Gather[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_devotees]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_devotees}}]]Devotees[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]throughout your campaign to spend on[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_pleasurable_acts]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_pleasurable_acts}}]]Pleasurable Acts[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]that benefit your home regions, or build special building that allows your to recruit Slaanesh's followers[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:ui/campaign ui/skills/hkrul_dolmance_special_0_2.png]][[/img]] [[col:yellow]]Dolmance does not have access to worship buildings and Prophetess, but has access to Slaanesh units and Chaos Sorcerer of Slaanesh instead.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:ui/campaign ui/effect_bundles/resource_wine.png]][[/img]][[col:green]]Collect wine producing places across the world that gives extra ordinary benefits to Dolmance[[/col]]\\n\\n{{tr:how_they_play_bretonnia}}

[[img:bullet_nor_gods]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Raze settlements and raise monoliths in their place to gradually pledge[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_gods]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_gods}}]]Allegiance to the Gods[[/tooltip]][[/url]][[col:green]], who will each grant factionwide gifts in lieu of the others.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:bullet_nor_monsters]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Hunt down creatures listed in the[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_monsters]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_monsters}}]]Monstrous Arcanum[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]and defeat them in battle in return for unique and powerful trophies.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:hkrul_image_khazag]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Thorgar's sole ambition is to ascend as Daemon Prince which he can achieve through various Paths to Glory.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_confederation]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Defeat the faction leaders of rival Norscan tribes to be given the option to form tribal[[/col]] [[sl_link:campaign_confederation]]confederations.[[/sl_link]]\\n\\nLearn more about Norsca [[url:script_link_campaign_norsca]]here[[/url]].

[[img:ui/campaign ui/skills/hkrul_arbaal_special_0_1.png]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Arbaal will gain additional bonus aside from bloodletting when winning multiple successive battles. However, whenever he fails to do so, there will be consequences.[[/col]]\\n\\n{{tr:how_they_play_khorne}}
[[img:icon_souls_resource]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Empower Archaon and yourself by collecting souls and handing off settlements to him[[/col]]\\n\\n{{tr:how_they_play_warriors_of_chaos}}

[[img:bullet_nor_gods]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Raze settlements and raise monoliths in their place to gradually pledge[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_gods]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_gods}}]]Allegiance to the Gods[[/tooltip]][[/url]][[col:green]], who will each grant factionwide gifts in lieu of the others.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:bullet_nor_monsters]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Hunt down creatures listed in the[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_monsters]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_monsters}}]]Monstrous Arcanum[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]and defeat them in battle in return for unique and powerful trophies.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:hkrul_image_tokmars]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Surtha Lenk is a master hunter with the ability to trap and tame even the fierced of beasts through the monster pen mechanic.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_confederation]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Defeat the faction leaders of rival Norscan tribes to be given the option to form tribal[[/col]] [[sl_link:campaign_confederation]]confederations.[[/sl_link]]\\n\\nLearn more about Norsca [[url:script_link_campaign_norsca]]here[[/url]].

[[img:ui/campaign ui/skills/hkrul_kita_special_0_1.png]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Grow your strength, and reconquer Amenemhetum the Great's realm to show your might unto the world[[/col]]\\n\\n{{tr:how_they_play_tomb_kings_ME}}

[[img:bullet_def_black_arks]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Duriath has access to his special flagship, while it gives him great benefits, he can only recruit units on land when garrisoned inside a settlement[[/col]]\\n\\n{{tr:how_they_play_dark_elves}}
You have garrisoned a Manhunter Contractor in #(settlement.region_and_province)!

[[img:bullet_nor_gods]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Raze settlements and raise monoliths in their place to gradually pledge[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_gods]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_gods}}]]Allegiance to the Gods[[/tooltip]][[/url]][[col:green]], who will each grant factionwide gifts in lieu of the others.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:bullet_nor_monsters]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Hunt down creatures listed in the[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_monsters]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_monsters}}]]Monstrous Arcanum[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]and defeat them in battle in return for unique and powerful trophies.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:rhox_beorg_dummy]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Ursine Creatures are drawn to the primal aura of the Ursfjording warriors, they may be corrupted and captured.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_confederation]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Defeat the faction leaders of rival Norscan tribes to be given the option to form tribal[[/col]] [[sl_link:campaign_confederation]]confederations.[[/sl_link]]\\n\\nLearn more about Norsca [[url:script_link_campaign_norsca]]here[[/url]].
